content: for the genomics folk - I've just uploaded a update that allows you to refer to a resource for another patient (needed for familyMemberHistory). When you select a reference datatype there's a new link 'find {{x}} resource for another patient. Selecting it displays a dialog where you can select the patient and the resource. A quick check shows that it seems to work with extensions of type reference (as it should) - but not exhaustively checked...

Other changes in this update:
- if you click 'save' when creating a resource, then subsequent 'saves' will update the resource (rather than creating a new one) until you close the editor.
- you can select a patient by id rather than name (useful when you already know the id - useless otherwise...)
let me know if there are issues with any of these changes...
Thanx David A) for being so responsive to this use case and B) for your amazing ability to juggle the many groups at the workshop! I'll pass this info on to Deven and Jaehoon
